    • Uses of IpPrefix in it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link

      Fields in it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link declared as IpPrefix 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IpPrefix NetworkBuilder.CORE_LOCAL_LINK_PREFIX4
      IPv4 prefix used for configuring core IPv4 router addresses (by default it uses IPv4 private addresses).
      static IpPrefix NetworkBuilder.CORE_LOCAL_LINK_PREFIX6
      IPv6 prefix used for configuring core IPv6 router addresses (by default it uses a ULA prefix).
      Methods in it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link with parameters of type IpPrefix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Network NetworkBuilder.linearIpNetwork(int n, long bit_rate, IpPrefix net_prefix)
      Creates a linear topology with n routers and n+1 links.
      static Network NetworkBuilder.linearIpNetworkAlt(int n, long bit_rate, IpPrefix net_prefix)
      reates a linear topology with N routers, and N+1 links.
      static Network NetworkBuilder.manhattanIpNetwork(int n, int m, long bit_rate, IpPrefix net_prefix)
      Creates a rectangular topology (Manhattan) with n*m routers and 2(n*m)+n+m links.
      static Network NetworkBuilder.treeIpCoreNetwork(int degree, int height, long bit_rate, IpPrefix net_prefix)
      Creates a binary tree topology with (m^n)-1 routers and (m^(n+1))-2 links, where n is the tree height and m is the tree degree.
